summary: This is a forwarded email chain regarding a defense witness list in the Epstein case, where a search for a specific name returned either too many results or no hits. It appears to be internal communication about managing witness information.

persons.name: R. Meder
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email regarding a defense witness list search.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email chain concerning a defense witness list.
A search was performed for a specific name, which resulted in either too many hits or no hits.
The communication is dated December 11-12, 2021, indicating ongoing case-related activity at that time.
